txt.en: In the shadow of the wall stands an evil-looking relic. You stare intently at the relic, and as you do you begin to feel a mounting sense of fear. The sensation becomes stronger, and as your terror grows, so too does your desire to run as far from the relic as you can. Just as suddenly as the feeling came upon you, it passes, but still the relic divulges no secrets.

'This relic is newly-placed; we came here to scout the approaches from the land of Angmar several days past, as Yrjänä desired, and it was not here then. Some servant of the Witch-king has left it here to fill us with fear, but it will not. The Lossoth cower for no one, not even the Witch-king, though he return in greater strength than before.'
'The Witch-king used to cast his storms at my people from this place.'
'We will not give in to fear, though this artifact try with all its might.'
A mysterious relic stands forebodingly before the sealed gate to Angmar. What secret does it hold?
The Lossoth study the mysterious relic they have found within the walls of the Ironspan.
